title: Boom to bust Biotech is now cutting jobs
text:
Boom to bust: Biotech is now cutting jobs 
CNN Money Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
stocks have lately crumbled amid fears they've gotten too expensive. Analysts warn biotech companies may not be able to tap the capital markets for cheap money to fuel their growth like they have in the past. "It's inevitable that as capital gets tighter, some companies will have to resort to other ways to stay afloat," said Thomas Shrader, an analyst who covers Biogen at Stifel Nicholas....
